entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
